Text:
This is very touching.  Impressive that the team was able to make this film.

To those who celebrate USA Thanksgiving: Watch this film with friends or family.  I cannot think of a more appropriate occasion for this material.

I'm not going to support PBS by buying their DVD's. That's why I'm here on TPB. So don't get all uppity. Thanks for the download. This issue and more are why I am not a consumer of anything Chinese. They are global enemy #1.
